org.treetank.api

Interface IPageReadTrx

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IPageWriteTrx
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PageReadTrx, PageWriteTrx

    public interface IPageReadTrx
    Read-Transaction of a page ensuring read-only access to any pages. The transaction must be bound to a revision and bases on a session. //Ensure, storage and resources are created final IStorage storage = Storage.openStorage(FILE); final ISession session = storage.getSession(new SessionConfiguration(RESOURCENAME, KEY)); final IPageReadTrx pRtx = session.beginPageReadTransaction(REVISION); Each IPageReadTrx can afterwards get nodes from the page-layer and the underlaying backend. Note that each session furthermore has access to a centralized store of common strings referencable over a key.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
